job_tasks.phrase: Support +20 miljoen klanten
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates the scale and impact of the business, which the AI platform is meant to support, showing an understanding of the business context.

job_tasks.phrase: Werken aan vitaal Nederland
job_tasks.justification: This phrase highlights a core business objective and societal contribution, which the role is implicitly expected to support.

job_tasks.phrase: At NN, our advanced Customer Data Platform (CUDAP) empowers our colleagues to serve customers faster and better.
job_tasks.justification: This sentence explains the business purpose of the platform and its impact on customer service, demonstrating business context.

job_tasks.phrase: your day-to-day work directly contributes to the transformation of our organisation.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly links the role's activities to a strategic business goal of organizational transformation.

job_tasks.phrase: Data Engineers and Data Scientists across the organization will rely on your expertise for top-notch service.
job_tasks.justification: This indicates that the role supports data engineers and data scientists, implying interaction with data pipelines and infrastructure.

job_tasks.phrase: Our team also delves into Function Apps, Web Apps, Databricks, SQL servers, and more.
job_tasks.justification: Databricks and SQL servers are commonly used in data engineering for processing and managing data.

job_tasks.phrase: focus on our AI services within this unique platform.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly mentions AI services, which are built upon models.

job_tasks.phrase: As an Azure GenAI Platform Engineer, you'll be at the heart of our technological advancements, ensuring the seamless use and continuous expansion of our platform.
job_tasks.justification: The role is described as being at the heart of technological advancements and ensuring the expansion of the platform, which includes AI services.

job_tasks.phrase: We are on the lookout for a passionate individual to focus on our AI services within this unique platform.
job_tasks.justification: This clearly states a focus on AI services, which involves the application and management of AI models.

job_tasks.phrase: As an Azure AI Platform Engineer, you'll dive deep into the AI side of our platform, enhancing the Azure API Manager with cutting-edge functionality to manage OpenAI resources in an intelligent way.
job_tasks.justification: This is a strong indicator of GenAI focus, specifically mentioning managing OpenAI resources and AI side of the platform.

job_tasks.phrase: Your expertise will help guide users in connecting via Python, making their experience effortless and efficient.
job_tasks.justification: Guiding users to connect to AI resources implies interaction with the models or the services that expose them.

job_tasks.phrase: maintain and enhance our platform, with Azure as your steadfast ally.
job_tasks.justification: Maintaining and enhancing a platform involves software development practices.

job_tasks.phrase: introducing and applying new components to make the lives of your colleagues easier and more efficient.
job_tasks.justification: Introducing and applying new components is a core software development activity.

job_tasks.phrase: deploy the latest Microsoft technologies.
job_tasks.justification: Deployment of technologies falls under software development and operations.

job_tasks.phrase: enhancing the Azure API Manager with cutting-edge functionality to manage OpenAI resources in an intelligent way.
job_tasks.justification: Enhancing an API Manager with new functionality is a software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: Take charge of our Azure infrastructure, ensuring it's robust and scalable to meet our evolving needs
job_tasks.justification: Taking charge of infrastructure and ensuring scalability relates to the software development lifecycle and architecture.

job_tasks.phrase: Your proficiency will ensure a platform that is not only reliable but also high-performing and resilient
job_tasks.justification: Ensuring reliability, performance, and resilience are key aspects of software development and maintenance.

job_tasks.phrase: Utilize your skills in PowerShell and Python to streamline operations and automate tasks, driving efficiency across the board
job_tasks.justification: Using scripting languages like PowerShell and Python for automation and streamlining operations is a software development practice.

job_tasks.phrase: Implement 'Infrastructure as Code' practices using ARM templates and Terraform, creating a more predictable and manageable infrastructure
job_tasks.justification: Infrastructure as Code is a software development practice applied to managing infrastructure.

job_tasks.phrase: Apply your expertise to secure the platform optimally, protecting our data and ensuring compliance with best practices
job_tasks.justification: Securing a platform and ensuring compliance are critical software development and engineering responsibilities.

job_tasks.phrase: In collaboration with a dynamic team, you'll maintain and enhance our platform, with Azure as your steadfast ally.
job_tasks.justification: Maintaining and enhancing a platform implies operational responsibilities, especially in a cloud environment.

job_tasks.phrase: The ever-evolving Azure ecosystem will be your playground, where you will deploy the latest Microsoft technologies.
job_tasks.justification: Deployment and managing within an evolving cloud ecosystem points to operations engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Imagine being at the forefront of AI innovation, where your day-to-day work directly contributes to the transformation of our organisation.
job_tasks.justification: While broad, being at the forefront of innovation and contributing to transformation can involve operationalizing new technologies.

job_tasks.phrase: Embrace a dynamic role where next to this you also rotate with your colleagues, stepping into the crucial role of platform administrator for two weeks every two months overseeing the complete platform.
job_tasks.justification: The role of platform administrator, overseeing the complete platform, is a direct indicator of operations engineering responsibilities.

job_tasks.phrase: Lead and Innovate: Take charge of our Azure infrastructure, ensuring it's robust and scalable to meet our evolving needs
job_tasks.justification: Taking charge of infrastructure and ensuring robustness and scalability are core operations engineering tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: Pipeline Pro: Leverage your knowledge of Pipelines within Azure DevOps to maintain a seamless CI/CD process, ensuring rapid and safe deployments
job_tasks.justification: This directly mentions CI/CD pipelines and Azure DevOps, which are central to MLOps and operations engineering.

classification.rationale: The job description explicitly mentions 'GenAI Platform Engineer' and 'Azure OpenAI,' indicating a focus on generative AI. The core responsibilities involve managing AI services, enhancing API managers for OpenAI resources, and integrating these with user-facing applications, aligning perfectly with the definition of a GenAI Engineer.
